name: bars
description: A simple SVG bar chart. Part of the tutorial series Let’s Make a Bar Chart.

name: hexbin
description: Computing hexbins from a constantly-fluctuating sample of 2,000 random points.

name: Marey’s Trains II
description: A variation of E.J. Marey’s graphical train schedule where color and slope redundantly encode train speed. The steeper and more orange the line, the faster the train.
